Package network

Class ObjectMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.ObjectMap
  • public class ObjectMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to hold all the messages that have been sent to every client and that can be reused. Every player have a dedicated list that holds all the messages that can be chosen. The list is cleared when needed, so only available actions can be made

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This methods add the token to the blackList and removes all the ControllerMessages already associated

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static ObjectMap get()

      • pick

        public ControllerMessage pick​(java.lang.String token,
                              java.lang.String choiceId,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
        This method handles the pick requests of the clients. First of all it checks if the Client can make the pick, and then if che choice is valid. If the client is not blocked the next ControllerMessage is sent, otherwise the client will receive a WAIT message.
        Parameters:
        token - token of the client
        choiceId - id of the ControllerMessage
        choices - A List containing all the element chosen
        Returns:
        A rollback if the choice is not valid, a WAIT if the client can't do the action or if the client is blocked, the next ControllerMessage otherwise

      • poll

        public ControllerMessage poll​(java.lang.String token,
                              ControllerMessage controllerMessage)
        This method handles the poll request. First of all it removes the client from the set of blocked. If the message is a WAIT one it sends a new wait message Otherwise it adds the message to the list of available messages
        Parameters:
        token - tje token of the caller
        controllerMessage - a message given by SlaveController
        Returns:
        a controllerMessage that contains the next action

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache​(java.lang.String token)
        This methods add the token to the blackList and removes all the ControllerMessages already associated
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the player
